product_name: Timbuk2 Seat Pack XT Saddle Pack - Medium
long_description: Keep tools, energy bars and other small items secure and close at hand on every ride with the Timbuk2 Seat Pack XT saddle pack. Built from rugged ballistic nylon construction with waterproof nylon accents. Medium-sized saddle pack holds small essentials such as ID, energy gels, keys and small tools; wide zippered opening provides easy access. Secures to bike seat with adjustable side-release buckle; front bungee secures pack to seat tube. Timbuk2 Seat Pack XT saddle pack features a reflective rear panel that doubles as an attachment point for bike lights.
short_description: Keep tools, energy bars and other small items secure and close at hand on every ride with the Timbuk2 Seat Pack XT saddle pack.
